description: A zxAnAccuracyDegradedAlm trap is sent when the agent has
detected that the time accuracy has been degraded.

event.Summary: Time accuracy has degraded due to $v1

description: The time accuracy degraded alarm reason.
A zxAn1588TimeAccuracyDegradeAlm alarm will be generated because
for the following threshold.
freqLol(1): frequency loss of lock.
freqQualityLevelBelowThresh(2): frequency quality level below
threshold.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-IEEE1588-MIB::zxAn1588TimeAccuracyDegradAlmRsn

description: A zxAn1588TimeAccuracyDegradeClr trap is sent when the agent has
detected that the time accuracy has come into the accurate status.

event.Summary: Time accuracy has come into the accurate status

description: The time accuracy degraded alarm reason.
A zxAn1588TimeAccuracyDegradeAlm alarm will be generated because
for the following threshold.
freqLol(1): frequency loss of lock.
freqQualityLevelBelowThresh(2): frequency quality level below
threshold.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-IEEE1588-MIB::zxAn1588TimeAccuracyDegradAlmRsn

description: A zxAn1588TimeSourceChanged trap is sent when the agent has
detected that the current time source of IEEE1588 device has been
changed to another new time source.

event.Summary: Time source of IEEE1588 device changed to $v4

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ZTE-AN-IEEE1588-MIB::zxAn1588TimeSourceChanged ZTE-AN-IEEE1588-MIB::zxAn1588LastTimeSourceType i 1 ZTE-AN-IEEE1588-MIB::zxAn1588LastTimeSourceId s EXAMPLE ZTE-AN-IEEE1588-MIB::zxAn1588TimeSourceType i 1 ZTE-AN-IEEE1588-MIB::zxAn1588TimeSourceId s EXAMPLE

description: The last time source type.
none(1): no time source.
ptp(2): PTP time source.
oneppsPlusTod: 1PPS+ToD time source.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-IEEE1588-MIB::zxAn1588LastTimeSourceType

description: The last time source identification.
It indicates the PTP time source ID when zxAn1588TimeSourceType is
ptp(1). It indicates the 1PPS+ToD time source ID when
zxAn1588TimeSourceType is oneppsPlusTod(2).
If zxAn1588TimeSourceType is none(1), the attribute value is
empty string.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-IEEE1588-MIB::zxAn1588LastTimeSourceId

description: The current time source type.
none(1): no time source.
ptp(2): PTP time source.
oneppsPlusTod: 1PPS+ToD time source.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-IEEE1588-MIB::zxAn1588TimeSourceType

description: The current time source identification.
It indicates the PTP time source ID when zxAn1588TimeSourceType is
ptp(1). It indicates the 1PPS+ToD time source ID when
zxAn1588TimeSourceType is oneppsPlusTod(2).
If zxAn1588TimeSourceType is none(1), the attribute value is
empty string.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-IEEE1588-MIB::zxAn1588TimeSourceId

description: A zxAn1588LocalTimeStatusChanged trap is sent when the agent has
detected that the current time status of IEEE1588 device has been
changed to another new time status.
The last local time status.
freeRun(1): the local time has never been synchronized with any
time source.
synchronizing(2): the local time is synchronizing with a time
source.
locked(3): the local time has been synchronized with a time source.
holdoverInspecification(4): the local time is no longer
synchronized with a time source and is using information
obtained while it was previously synchronized or other
information sources were still available, to maintain
performance within desired specification.
It is defined in recommendation G.8275.1 appendix V.
holdoverOutOfSpecification(5): the local time is no longer
synchronized with a time source and, while it may be
using information obtained while it was previously
synchronized or other information sources were still
available, it is unable to maintain performance
within desired specification.
It is defined in recommendation G.8275.1 appendix V.
holdover(6): the local time is no longer synchronized with a time
source, this value is only used for
zxAn1588LocalTimeStatusChanged trap.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-IEEE1588-MIB::zxAn1588LastLocalTimeStatus

description: The local time status.
freeRun(1): the local time has never been synchronized with any
time source.
synchronizing(2): the local time is synchronizing with a time
source.
locked(3): the local time has been synchronized with a time source.
holdoverInspecification(4): the local time is no longer
synchronized with a time source and is using information
obtained while it was previously synchronized or other
information sources were still available, to maintain
performance within desired specification.
It is defined in recommendation G.8275.1 appendix V.
holdoverOutOfSpecification(5): the local time is no longer
synchronized with a time source and, while it may be
using information obtained while it was previously
synchronized or other information sources were still
available, it is unable to maintain performance
within desired specification.
It is defined in recommendation G.8275.1 appendix V.
holdover(6): the local time is no longer synchronized with a time
source, this value is only used for
zxAn1588LocalTimeStatusChanged trap.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-IEEE1588-MIB::zxAn1588LocalTimeStatus

description: A zxAnPtpNeverSyncAlm trap is sent when the agent has
detected that the PTP clock has never been synchronized with a
time source.

event.Summary: PTP clock has never been synchronized with a time source

description: A zxAnPtpNeverSyncClr trap is sent when the agent has
detected that the PTP clock has been synchronized with a
time source.

event.Summary: PTP clock has been synchronized with a time source

description: A zxAnPtpLolAlm trap is sent when the agent has detected
that the PTP clock was in the loss of lock status.

event.Summary: PTP clock was in the loss of lock status

description: A zxAnPtpLolClr trap is sent when the agent has
detected that the PTP clock has been locked again.

event.Summary: PTP clock has been locked again

description: A zxAnPtpClockTCBelowThreshAlm trap is sent when the agent has
detected that the PTP clock traceability class has been below
zxAnPtpClockTraceClassThresh threshold.

event.Summary: PTP clock traceability class has been below the threshold

description: A zxAnPtpClockTCBelowThreshClr trap is sent when the agent has
detected that the PTP clock traceability class has not been below
zxAnPtpClockTraceClassThresh threshold.

event.Summary: PTP clock traceability class threshold alarm cleared

description: A zxAnPtpAnnounceMsgLostAlm trap is sent when the agent has
detected that the announce messages lost.
A zxAnPtpAnnounceMsgLostClr trap is sent when the agent has
detected that the announce messages are received again.
A zxAn1ppsPlusTodLosAlm trap is sent when the agent has
detected that the '1PPS+ToD' port was in the loss of signal
status.

event.Summary: 1PPS+ToD port was in the loss of signal status

description: This object indicates the rack number.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-IEEE1588-MIB::zxAnSyncTime1ppsSrcRack

description: This object indicates the shelf number.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-IEEE1588-MIB::zxAnSyncTime1ppsSrcShelf

description: This object indicates the slot number.
Only support time card, such as cick.

description: The physical port number.
It is valid only for the 'onepps' signal type.
